title: Devasena Ruby & CZ Floral Kasu Mala - Exquisite Bridal Haaram
materials: 22K Gold plated Copper Alloy. Features high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones in a brilliant cut and meticulously placed Ruby colored stones. Showcases a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This captivating haaram boasts a unique floral design, interlocked with traditional Kasu (coin) motifs crafted with exquisite detailing and adorned with glistening CZ stones. The ruby colored stones set strategically add a regal touch. Features a secure clasp closure.
colors: Primarily gold with a vibrant contrast from the red/ruby colored stones and sparkling white CZ stones.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale parties and formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: This haaram combines timeless tradition with modern elegance. The meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail make it a heirloom piece. The strategic placement of ruby colored stones against the gold and CZ stones gives it a royal, grand appearance. It's durable, comfortable to wear, and a stunning representation of South Indian heritage.
